name: Horror sector
description:
Horror sector

So, you are a security guard of the 7-P laboratory, or rather in sector A-8, your sector is also called the sector of fear, since they were engaged in the study of alien creatures. Well, you have already arrived, but in the sector of devastation.

So, according to the protocol, in the event of an attack or leak, security personnel must report the incident, and must also turn on the siren.

Well, good luck.

WASD – movement

F – Flashlight

R – Reloading

E – Pick up

To use an item, you need to walk up to the object you want to interact with or throw the item. Q – Drop (after using the item, press Q) Left mouse button – shoot Please download :)
